How to get all your cards back
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battle Card Archive (Game Boy): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): How to get all your cards back
By mohawkpunk on Saturday, June 1, 2002 - 05:54 pm:

okay i heard that you can get your cards back after you go through time.

By Harehound5 on Saturday, June 1, 2002 - 08:03 pm:

Battle that grumpy old geaser with Momo (I think) then he'll help you find a "huge disk". Unlock it and every single card you had will be regained. Hope that helps you. Good luck!

By Harehound5 on Saturday, June 1, 2002 - 08:14 pm:

I was wrong. Get Master or Gold Class (I'm not sure). A old man will appear at the entrance of town. Battle and win against him and he'll give you the huge disk. K?

By Khoi M. Luong, the master breeder. on Sunday, June 2, 2002 - 05:25 pm:

It's Master Class, then he battles you......
